findings.title: Block gas limit
findings.description: The updateEmissionRate function can fail due to the block gas limit if the pool size is too big.

findings.title: add function issue
findings.description: If some LP token is added to the contract twice using function add, then the total amount of reward in function updatePool will be incorrect.

findings.title: Owner can change the pool details such as deposit fee
findings.description: The owner of the contract has the privilege to modify pool details including deposit fees without any restrictions.

findings.title: Owner of the token can pause the transfers any time
findings.description: The owner of the token has the privilege to pause token transfers at any time.
